## Introduction

vue脚手架工具，初始化一个vue前端项目

## Usage

```
1. npm install wl-vue-cli -g
2. wl-vue init [projectName]
```

## api

### Creating a New Project with elementUI

    wl-vue init [projectName]

    eg: wl-vue init projectOne


## Depend on

*   commander.js
*   download-git-repo
*   Inquirer.js
